text: Iye wakuletsani kudya zinthu zofa zokha, liwende, nyama ya nkhumba, ndiponso nyama iliyonse imene yaphedwa mâ€™dzina la mulungu wina wosati Mulungu mmodzi yekha. Koma ngati wina akakamizidwa kudya zina za izi, osati mofuna yekha kapena mofuna kuphwanya malamulo, ndithudi, Mulungu ndi wokhululukira ndi wachifundo chosatha
